name: EduBridge-Online Tutor Booking Platform
description: A platform where students can find, review, and book tutors for various subjects and languages.
challenges: Implementing real-time booking calendar and handling timezone differences.
futurePlans: Add AI tutor recommendations and support video conferencing.

name: ScholarGateway-Scholarship Management System
description: A complete solution for managing scholarships, applications, and reviews.
challenges: Integrating secure payment gateway and role-based access control.
futurePlans: Add AI-based scholarship matching and multi-language support.

name: HobbyHeaven - Local Hobby Group Organizer
description: A local hobby group organizer where users can discover, join, and create hobby-based communities like book clubs, hiking crews, and painting circles. Features include event scheduling, group management, and responsive design for all devices.
challenges: Implementing group membership logic, restricting joins after start dates, and ensuring responsive interactive UI with multiple animations.
futurePlans: Add in-app chat for group members, advanced search with filters, and real-time event reminders.
